Zekrom (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0643: Reshiram
Pokémon
#0645: Landorus →

Zekrom has been featured on 16 different cards since it debuted in the Black & White expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Zekrom cards are normally Lightning-type or Dragon-type Basic Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Zekrom

Zekrom
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
